verses.verse: But there will be <S%H3808>no<s%> [more] <S%H4155>gloom<s%> for her <S%H834>who<s%> was in <S%H4164>anguish;<s%> in <S%H7223>earlier<s%> <S%H6256>times<s%> He <S%H7043>treated<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> with <S%H7043>contempt,<s%> but <S%H314>later<s%> on He shall <S%H3513>make<s%> [it] <S%H3513>glorious,<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> Will <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H216>light;<s%> Those who <S%H3427>live<s%> in a <S%H6757>dark<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> The <S%H216>light<s%> will <S%H5050>shine<s%> on them.

Thou shalt <S%H7235>multiply<s%> the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H1431>increase<s%> their <S%H8057>gladness;<s%> They will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in Thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> As with the <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> As men <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> when they <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>

For Thou shalt <S%H2865>break<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of their <S%H5448>burden<s%> and the <S%H4294>staff<s%> on their <S%H7926>shoulders,<s%> The <S%H7626>rod<s%> of their <S%H5065>oppressor,<s%> as at the <S%H3117>battle<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

For <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5430>boot<s%> of the <S%H5431>booted<s%> <S%H5431>warrior<s%> in the [battle] <S%H7494>tumult,<s%> And <S%H8071>cloak<s%> <S%H1556>rolled<s%> in <S%H1818>blood,<s%> will be for <S%H8316>burning,<s%> <S%H3980>fuel<s%> for the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

For a <S%H3206>child<s%> will be <S%H3205>born<s%> to us, a <S%H1121>son<s%> will be <S%H5414>given<s%> to us; And the <S%H4951>government<s%> will <S%H1961>rest<s%> on His <S%H7926>shoulders;<s%> And His <S%H8034>name<s%> will be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6382>Wonderful<s%> <S%H3289>Counselor,<s%> <S%H1368>Mighty<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5703>Eternal<s%> Father, <S%H1>Prince<s%> of <S%H8269>Peace.<s%>

<S%H369>There<s%> will be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7093>end<s%> to the <S%H4766>increase<s%> of [His] <S%H4951>government<s%> or of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> On the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> To <S%H3559>establish<s%> it and to <S%H5582>uphold<s%> it with <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> From <S%H6258>then<s%> on and <S%H5703>forevermore.<s%> <S%H5769><s%> The <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will <S%H6213>accomplish<s%> <S%H384>this.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sends<s%> a <S%H1697>message<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And it <S%H5307>falls<s%> on <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> [it,] [That is,] <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> <S%H559>Asserting<s%> in <S%H1346>pride<s%> and in <S%H1433>arrogance<s%> of heart: <S%H3824><s%>

"The <S%H3843>bricks<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H5307>down,<s%> But we will <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> with <S%H1496>smooth<s%> <S%H1496>stones;<s%> The <S%H8256>sycamores<s%> have been <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>down,<s%> But we will <S%H2498>replace<s%> [them] with <S%H730>cedars.<s%>"
Therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7682>raises<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> from <S%H7526>Rezin,<s%> And <S%H5526>spurs<s%> their <S%H340>enemies<s%> on,

The <S%H758>Arameans<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> on the <S%H268>west;<s%> And they <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3605>gaping<s%> <S%H6310>jaws.<s%> In [spite of] <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> does not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away,<s%> And His <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out.
Yet the <S%H5971>people<s%> do not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to Him who <S%H5221>struck<s%> them, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> do they <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>cuts<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H2180>tail<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> [Both] <S%H3712>palm<s%> <S%H3712>branch<s%> and <S%H100>bulrush<s%> in a <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
The <S%H7218>head<s%> is the <S%H2205>elder<s%> and <S%H6440>honorable<s%> <S%H5375><s%> man, And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> who <S%H3384>teaches<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> is the <S%H2180>tail.<s%>

For those who <S%H833>guide<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H8582>leading<s%> [them] <S%H8582>astray;<s%> And those who are <S%H833>guided<s%> by them are <S%H1104>brought<s%> to <S%H1104>confusion.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> does not <S%H8055>take<s%> <S%H8055>pleasure<s%> in their <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> does He <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>pity<s%> on their <S%H3490>orphans<s%> or their <S%H490>widows;<s%> For <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> of them is <S%H2611>godless<s%> and an <S%H7489>evildoer,<s%> And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H5039>foolishness.<s%> In [spite of] <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> does not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away,<s%> And His <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out.

For <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H1197>burns<s%> like a <S%H784>fire;<s%> It <S%H398>consumes<s%> <S%H8068>briars<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns;<s%> It even <S%H3341>sets<s%> the <S%H5442>thickets<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest<s%> <S%H3341>aflame,<s%> And they <S%H55>roll<s%> <S%H55>upward<s%> in a <S%H1348>column<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke.<s%>

By the <S%H5678>fury<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6272>burned<s%> up, And the <S%H5971>people<s%> are like <S%H3980>fuel<s%> for the <S%H784>fire;<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2550>spares<s%> his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And they <S%H1504>slice<s%> <S%H1504>off<s%> [what is] on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> but [still] are <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> And they <S%H398>eat<s%> [what is] on the <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> but they are not <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> <S%H376>Each<s%> of them <S%H398>eats<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his own <S%H2220>arm.<s%>

<S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> [devours] <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> [And] <S%H9191>together<s%> they are <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> In [spite of] <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> does not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away,<s%> And His <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out.
